title: How do I add a widget to a home screen?
answer:
1. On a home screen, touch and hold a blank area. The Set home screen window is
displayed.
2. Touch Widgets.
3. Select a widget in the list and drag it to a desired home screen.
4. Touch to return to the home screen.
If the blank area in the home screen is insufficient to receive widgets, a new home screen is
automatically created on the right side of the home screen and the widgets will be placed in the new
home screen.
